metadata.title: CVE-2019-11139 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Improper conditions check in the voltage modulation interface for someIntel(R) Xeon(R) Scalable Processors may allow a privileged user topotentially enable denial of service via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11139` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20191112-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20191112-0ubuntu0.18.04.2').
